title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS update - new hotfix announced  - version 1.12.17.0
description:
Last week Asobo announced that they are working on hotfix/update to fix the issues both introduced as part of Sim Update 7 and some other long standing issues. Based on a community post which I found we are going to discuss which items will likely be fixed in this update which is planned to be released in December.
